  • Method Details

    • getWebAppHeaders

      public static jakarta.ws.rs.core.MultivaluedMap<String,Object> getWebAppHeaders()
      Returns:
      map of HTTP headers to use when making API requests to the web application

    • enableProjects

      public static void enableProjects(String webappUri) throws jakarta.ws.rs.client.ResponseProcessingException, jakarta.ws.rs.ProcessingException, jakarta.ws.rs.WebApplicationException
      Enable projects in the remote application.

      NOTE: performs a check if the projects are already enabled, before making the change request

      Parameters:
      webappUri - the url to the remote web application
      Throws:
      jakarta.ws.rs.client.ResponseProcessingException - in case processing of a received HTTP response fails
      jakarta.ws.rs.ProcessingException - in case the request processing or subsequent I/O operation fails
      jakarta.ws.rs.WebApplicationException - in case the response status code of the response returned by the server is not successful

    • markProjectIndexed

      public static void markProjectIndexed(String webappUri, Project project)
      Mark project as indexed via API call. Assumes the project is already known to the webapp.
      Parameters:
      webappUri - URI for the webapp
      project - project to mark as indexed

    • getProjects

      public static Collection<String> getProjects(String webappUri)
      Parameters:
      webappUri - URI for the webapp
      Returns:
      list of projects known to the webapp
